author: betaras.nft
content: What's the best programming language for Web 3.0 development?

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: the thing about web3.0 is the inter-operabilitymeaning online games could interact with metaverse shopping malls.etc etcwhich all interact with webpages and blockchains.so its NOT about what language does web3.0 use. but more about what product/service do you want to create and what is the best language to make a great product/servicethink about what product/service you want to offer then think about whats the best platform, app, software, O.S to provide that to find your answer.web3.0 is meant to open up the options so that people dont have to be stuck to one language. so pick the one that suits your product/service best, and then learn that options method to api-call, websocket send or packet data send to other users/services to inter-communicate.
